description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in MultiVendorX Product Catalog Enquiry for WooCommerce by MultiVendorX allows Exploiting Incorrectly Configured Access Control Security Levels.This issue affects Product Catalog Enquiry for WooCommerce by MultiVendorX: from n/a through 5.0.2.

product.name: Product Catalog Enquiry for WooCommerce by MultiVendorX
